javadoc: Class for keeping track of a field that is the process of being dragged.

methods.javadoc: Construct a Moving Field for the field at the given row and column.
methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Construct a Moving Field for the field at the given row and column.

methods.javadoc: Moves the floating field by the given deltas.
methods.name: moveFloating
methods.comment: Moves the floating field by the given deltas.

methods.javadoc: Moves the base field to a new position in the header.
methods.name: move
methods.comment: Moves the base field to a new position in the header.

methods.javadoc: Resets relative position state when the base field is moved.
methods.name: reset
methods.comment: Resets relative position state when the base field is moved.

methods.javadoc: Returns the start position of the base field.
methods.name: getStart
methods.comment: Returns the start position of the base field.

name: MovingField
comment: Class for keeping track of a field that is the process of being dragged.
